title: I am afraid Riot will upgrade the client and it will still be laggy as hell for other people
body:
New client even with low spec mode  is still laggy and makes some fps drops for some people
don't replace it untill you fix it

replies.body:
Since you're looking to leave direct feedback on the League Client, I recommend reposting this on our [**Client Discussion Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion), where the client update team is more likely to see it. Since I don't work on that team, I'm not able to pass your feedback on directly.

Let me know if you have any questions.
